backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing video sharing platform with user profiles, video uploads (including Vidle validation for 9:16 aspect ratio and 5-150 second duration), likes, comments, follow/unfollow functionality, and access control using mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: SkelUlt logo in Layout header, Enable/Disable follow button in VideoCard, smooth animation for follow button state transitions, and unfollow functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (Layout with SkelUlt logo, VideoCard with follow button, modals, video player), pages (Feed, Profile, VideoDetail, Messaging, Vidles), hooks for backend queries/mutations, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, 'SkelUlt' title, root div for React mounting, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes (feed, vidles, profile, video detail, messages, 404), wrapping with ThemeProvider, QueryClientProvider, ErrorBoundary, Layout, and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/ChatThread.tsx: Chat thread component displaying message history with recipient profile header, scrollable message list with auto-scroll on new messages, loading skeletons, and MessageInput for sending new messages.
frontend/src/components/CommentInput.tsx: Comment input form with textarea and submit button that posts comments to videos using useCommentOnVideo hook, includes authentication check, validation, loading states, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Displays a scrollable list of comments for a video, showing author avatars, usernames, timestamps, and comment text with navigation to user profiles.
frontend/src/components/ConversationList: Renders a list of message conversation partners with avatars, last message previews, and timestamps, allowing users to select a conversation.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: Modal dialog for editing user profile including username, bio, and profile picture with image upload and preview functionality.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a reload button and expandable error details.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Button component for following/unfollowing users with optimistic UI updates, loading states, and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with sticky header containing logo, navigation buttons (Home, Vidles, Upload, Messages, Profile), theme toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/LikeButton.tsx: Heart-shaped like button for videos with optimistic updates, like count display, and authentication requirement.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays a chat message bubble with content, optional video link, and timestamp. Styles differently for own vs. received messages.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message composition form with textarea, video attachment picker, and send button. Handles message submission with optional video links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile creation requiring username and optional bio. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Button component that copies video URL to clipboard when clicked, with toast notification feedback.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component displaying video thumbnail, metadata, uploader info, and interactive elements (like, share, delete, follow). Handles video playback preview and navigation to detail page.
frontend/src/components/VideoGrid.tsx: Grid layout component displaying video thumbnails with play overlay, delete button for own videos, and Vidle badge. Includes delete confirmation dialog.
Dialog modal for selecting a video from user's uploaded videos to attach to a message. Shows grid of video thumbnails with titles and like counts.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploadModal: Modal for uploading videos with title, description, tags, and content type selection (video/vidle). Validates Vidle requirements (5s-2:30min duration, 9:16 aspect ratio) before upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, videos, comments, messages, likes, follows, and notifications with proper error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with neon-inspired color schemes for light/dark modes, custom utility classes for glow effects and gradients, and global styling for scrollbars and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays a feed of most-liked videos with loading and error states, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/pages/MessagingPage.tsx: Implements a two-column messaging interface with conversation list and chat thread, requiring authentication and redirecting unauthenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile information with avatar, bio, stats, and video grid; shows edit button for own profile and follow button for other users.
frontend/src/pages/VideoDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single video with player, metadata (title, description, tags), uploader profile info, engagement buttons (like/share), and comment section. Handles loading, error, and not-found states with navigation back to feed.
frontend/src/pages/VidlesPage.tsx: Displays a feed of short-form vertical videos (Vidles) with engagement features, handles empty states, and shows a profile setup modal for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, neon shadow effects, custom animations, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata for SkelUlt social video platform documenting architecture (multi-platform video hosting, messaging, Vidles feature), known issues (white screen after v5), and implemented features list.
